text:
e="preserve">Moran Atias (; born April 9, 1981) is an Israeli-American actress and model. She was born in Haifa, Israel.
Atias first became known for her roles in the Italian movies "Oggi sposi", and "Mother of Tears". She is best known for her work with in the 2008 TV series "Crash" and the 2013 movie "Third Person". She also starred on the FX television series "Tyrant".
In February 2017, Atias became a naturalized U.S. citizen.
